text: John Michael Papit (July 25, 1928 â€“ April 6, 2015) was an American football halfback in the National Football League. He played for the Washington Redskins and the Green Bay Packers. He played college football at the University of Virginia and was drafted in the seventh round of the 1951 NFL Draft. ==Other websites== *Just Sports Stats Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
